name: Gabelli Global Utility & Income Trust
description: Gabelli Global Utility & Income Trust is a closed-end fund that invests primarily in utility companies and income-generating equities. Established by the Gabelli family, the trust focuses on providing investors with a steady stream of income and capital appreciation through a diversified portfolio. The fund primarily targets companies in the utility sector, which includes electric, gas, and water utilities, as well as other infrastructure and renewable energy companies. By investing in these sectors, Gabelli Global Utility & Income Trust aims to capitalize on the stability and growth potential of essential services that are less sensitive to economic cycles. The fund is managed by a team of experienced professionals who utilize a value-oriented investment approach, seeking undervalued securities with the potential for long-term growth. In addition to its focus on domestic utilities, the trust also considers international investments to diversify its holdings and enhance returns. With an emphasis on risk management and thorough analysis, Gabelli Global Utility & Income Trust strives to achieve attractive risk-adjusted returns for its shareholders, making it a compelling option for income-focused investors looking for exposure to the utility sector.
